short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle Wikipedia citation markers on and off

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Toggles showing and hiding Wikipedia reference/citation markers.

By default the extension hides citation markers in articles to improve Wikipedia article readability. For the few times you actually want to check a reference, just click the extension icon and they will reappear.

Note: the extension only activates on Wikipedia wiki pages, so if it's grayed out, visit such a page (e.g. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_Archive).
